hero.title: Pay for what you
hero.description: Modular platform pricing plus usage-based costs. Scale from pilot to production with volume discounts that grow with you.

modules.title: Choose your modules
modules.description: Start with Data Engine, then add VisionAI Factory and Reliability Engine as needed. Each module includes 3 user seats with the option to add more.

reliabilityEngine.name: Reliability Engine
reliabilityEngine.description: Model monitoring, performance tracking, drift detection

labelerSeats.title: Labeler Seats
labelerSeats.description: Add annotation workforce access. Unlimited seats available.

usage.title: Volume discounts that scale with you
usage.description: Pay only for what you use. As your volume grows, your per-unit cost decreases automatically.

mu.title: Monitoring Units (MU)
mu.subtitle: For production inference monitoring
mu.conversionNote: Each monitored inference counts as 1 prediction

gpu.title: GPU Compute
gpu.description: Pay-per-use GPU allocation for training and inference. No commitment required.

annotation.title: Annotation Services
annotation.description: Professional labeling services with trained annotators for your projects.

enterprise.title: Custom pricing for large deployments
enterprise.description: For organizations with high-volume needs, we offer custom pricing packages with negotiated rates, dedicated support, and enterprise SLAs.

items.question: What is a Data Processing Unit (DPU)?
items.answer: DPU is our unit for measuring data ingestion and processing. Standard images convert at 60 images = 1 DPU, videos at 1 video = 1 DPU, and multi-spectral images at 5 images = 1 DPU.

items.question: What is a Monitoring Unit (MU)?
items.answer: MU measures production inference monitoring. Each MU covers 1,000 monitored predictions through the Reliability Engine for quality tracking and drift detection.

items.question: Can I use modules independently?
items.answer: The Data Engine can be used standalone. VisionAI Factory and Reliability Engine both require the Data Engine as a foundation. Each module includes 3 user seats.

items.question: How does volume pricing work?
items.answer: Volume discounts are applied based on your annual cumulative usage. As you process more data or monitor more predictions, you get better rates automatically.

items.question: What about enterprise pricing?
items.answer: For large deployments, we offer custom pricing with negotiated volume commitments, dedicated support, and SLAs. Contact our sales team for details.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.description: Start with a free trial or talk to our team to find the right plan for your needs.
